attributes.action: Stop Landlords discriminating against potential tenants for having pets.
attributes.background: It’s not fair that families and individuals with pets for their mental health or companionship are discriminated against for rental properties.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Ban Blanket No Pet Clauses in Tenancy Agreements & Leases.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/566355
